description: '''Owerri Bongo''' ''('''Bongo'''/'''Igbo Bongo''')'' is a style of [[Igbo highlife]] music that has its origins in the Igbo people of [[Owerri]] and spread around all Imo State, which is in eastern Nigeria. The musical style is a sub-genre of [[Igbo highlife]] music. Unlike Igbo highlife, which is known for its [[Brass instrument|brass horns]] and often somber feel. Owerri Bongo is typified by its heavy use of drums'' ([[Igba]])'' and the Owerri dialect in which the genre is usually sung.
